title: Stainless Steel Appliances! Wonderful Location! Walk to Everything!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Call Apartment Guys at 773-549-3474 and ask for reference #2201936.
This rehabbed one bedroom is in a wonderful spot right in the center of the exciting Lakeview area!
It features an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher!
It also has hardwood floors and is located just four blocks from the Belmont Red and Brown Line train stops!
Prices are subject to change.***Photos may be of a similar unit.
*For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #2201936
